title: TV Man by Kyle Harrison
description:
A fantastic author and finally answers the question about a man who delivers TVs. Featuring a nice cameo from ThatCreepyReading.

TCP: https://www.youtube.com/user/ThatCreepyReading
The Author: https://www.facebook.com/colourblindness330/ / https://www.reddit.com/user/Colourblindness/posts/
Video!: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3k7vetBdyrM
